5 Kure Senyi Kumusha?
markdown:
### 5 Kure Senyi Kumusha?

 A kurekure kumusha?   
Ndabvunza murindi, ati,   
Usiku hurikupera,   
Kwakuda kuyedza.   
Usacheme, kurumidza,   
Mutewere, kusimbira;   
Muchasvika mukupenya   
Hakuna kupera.

Ndabvunza kune mukani,   
Anerwiyo rwekushinga,   
Ngekushinga ndinokana,   
Hondo ichapera.   
Musacheme, mutiwire,   
Dakara basa rapera,   
Tinoziva tinechipo,   
Kuti takurira

Ndabvunzazve pasi, zuva,   
Zvese zvakandipindura;   
Nguva irikundopera,   
Jesu anouya.   
Musacheme, zviwoniso zve   
Zviri kutinyewera,   
Zvisikwa zvese zvinoda   
Tsuri imborira.

Tiripatyo nekumusha,   
Kunofadza kutondera   
Chifarai imwi vafambi,   
Bvisanyi’wo kutya.   
Musacheme, tisangane   
Apo kusina kuneta,   
Zviyedzo’zvo zvakapera,   
Tasvika kumusha

Mbeu’dzo tinodya, Dzinovamba kukura   
Dzojekesa mumwoyo, mazuva opfuura

title: 285 Kune Nzvimbo Yakanaka
markdown:
### 285 Kune Nzvimbo Yakanaka

 Kune nzvimbo yakanaka, Petyo pana Baba   
Nzvimbo isina chitema , Petyo kuna Baba

  **CHORUS:**      
O Jesu Mununuri, makatuma pasi   
Mutisvededze isu, petyo kuna Baba

Kune nzvimbo yerufaro, Petyo kuna Baba   
Apo takumbana Naye, Petyo kuna Baba

Kune nzvimbo yezororo, Petyo kuna Baba   
Nzvimbo iyo yerufaro, Petyo kuna Baba

title: 286 O Nditakure
markdown:
### 286 O Nditakure

 Ndoona rini’ko musi, Apo vaponeswa Vaswika Zioni   
Musha werufaro kwazvo

  **CHORUS:**      
O nditakure, nditakure, kuZioni   
O chinditakura kuguta’ro revatsvene

O ndichanzva Hariruya, Rwoimbwa nechita   
Nerufaro chichaimba, Rwiyo rwenunuro

Onayi mbiri yosvika, Iyo m’fambi anoda   
Inonyaradza vachemi, Rufaro rwosvika

title: 287 Mukuyedzwa Jesu
markdown:
### 287 Mukuyedzwa Jesu

Mukuyedzwa, Jesu ndimirireyi   
Tenzi kuti ini, ndisamusiye   
Kuti ndotenheka, nditsiureyi   
Musandibvumire, kuputsikazve

Pasi nerufaro, Rwakarambidzwa   
Neupfumi hwaro, Zvisandi ku’adza   
Mugonditondedza neGetsimani   
Kana muchinjiko, weKarivari

Kana ’mi maunza, urombo, nhamo   
Kana ndirwadziwe, munzira pasi   
Bvumira ndione, r’woko rwenyu   
Bvumirayi kuti ndimusimbire

title: 288 Wakaunza Zvipo Kuna jesu
markdown:
### 288 Wakaunza Zvipo Kuna jesu

  Vaunza kuna Jesu, zvipo zvavo zvese   
Rudo kuna M’ponesi, Rwaita vamupe   
Manzvi ese emutsa, kubatsira vamwe   
Zvese-zvo zvipo zvavo akazvigashira

  **CHORUS:**      
Waunza kuna Jesu, chipo chakanaka!   
Ita, Ndamupa mwoyo, pamakumbo ako

Pakange pane m’fambi, ayidawo kupa   
Akaonawo zvipo, zvo vaipa Tenzi   
Ayidisa zvikuru kuti ape chipo   
Akamirawo petyo asina nechiro

Achema ati, Tenzi ndimwi mune mutsa   
Tora zvese, ndinazvo, nemwoyo wechivi   
Jesu akapindura, Chikuru chipo chako   
Kupinda zvimwe zvese, zvaunzwa kuneni

title: 289 Nditoreyi Ini
markdown:
### 289 Nditoreyi Ini

 Jesu Tenzi ndinochema, Ndofa asi m’kabatsira   
O unzayi ruponeso, Nditoreyi ini

  **CHORUS:**      
Nditoreyi im’! Nditoreyi ini!   
Kristu wandifira ini, nditoreyi ini

Handinaka rubatsiro, Asi imwi mandifira   
Mungandi’te zvamunoda, Nditoreyi ini

Hapana zvandagadzira, Zvitsidzo zvangu ndotyora   
Asi ndiponeseyiwo, Nditoreyi ini

Ndiri pamakumbo enyu, Ndiiteyi sezvamunoda   
Pedzisayi basa renyu, Nditoreyi Tenzi

Kuti ndibate nesimba, Ndimutsirireyi mwoyo   
Ndichaita kuda kwenyu, Nditoreyi Tenzi

Kana basa razopera, Hondo yepasi yapera   
Ndinozokuchemerayi, Nditoreyi Tenzi

title: 290 Tinofara Kubatira Tenzi
markdown:
### 290 Tinofara Kubatira Tenzi

 Tinofara kubatira Tenzi, Tinobvuma kumubatira   
Basa iro Tenzi anotipa, Tinoita nekutendeka

  **CHORUS:**      
Tomubatira, toenda mberi   
Tine rufaro, Tomubatira   
Pano mumunda wake

Tinofara kuparadza shoko, Nerudo kune vanhu pasi   
Jesu arikupenya kwaBaba, Anotipa zvikomborero

Nekupfava totevera Tenzi, Tinofamba nekuperera   
Topangidza vamwe kuna Tenzi, Nevanyangadzi kugwayana

title: 291 Yakafanira Nyenye
markdown:
### 291 Yakafanira Nyenye

 Yakafanira nyenye,  Yakafanira nyenye;   
Yakafanira nyenye, Yabaiwa

  **CHORUS:**      
Mbiri, Hariruya, Kudza Hariruya!   
Mbiri, Hariruya! Kunyenye.

Tenzi unza umambo! Huzopedza chitema;   
Unzai makore churu, Moyera.

Nguva dzese tinonzwa, Tim’de Timusandire   
Tinosvika Zioni, Tim’one

title: 292 Mawoko Maviri
markdown:
### 292 Mawoko Maviri

 Ndichazo musevenzera Jesu   
Ndomutenda nemuromo   
Nzeve dzangu dzichazomunzwa   
Ndomuimbira neinzwi

  **CHORUS:**      
Tenzi tinouya,   
Tinouya tiri vana   
Tenzi tinouya,   
Tidzidze nemi

Ndichazofamba munzira yake   
Inoenda kudenga’yo   
Maziso kufunda Bhaibheri   
Nerudo rwake Kristu

Ndine mwoyo wekumupa Jesu   
Mweya umwe aponese   
Upenyu humwe murusando   
Zvese zvangu ngezvakewo

title: 293 Gogo, Gogo
markdown:
### 293 Gogo, Gogo

 Gogo, gogo, ndiani? Arindira akanaka!   
Mufambi weumambo zve Asati awonekwa   
A! mweya wangu, zaruravo mwoyo   
Chishamiso chipinde’mo mukati

Gogo, gogo, Achipo, Arindira, Oshamisa   
Handinyore kuzarura, zvo zvite zvakurisa   
Zvadzikisa midzi yazvo, Kutenderedza   
m’siwo; Kuti usazarure

Gogo, gogo, Achipo? Arindira, Akanaka   
Anogogodza musiwo, nechiremba   
chemhinzwa; Arindira nemutsa, Tenzi   
akarindira; Woreg’ aripo here

title: 294 Fukidzwa Neupenyu Hwake
markdown:
### 294 Fukidzwa Neupenyu Hwake

Nangisa Jesu, Hana chitema;Upenyu hwake, hwapiwe’ni   
Upenyu hwangu nechitema, Hwafukwa nehwake kuchena

  **CHORUS:**      
Ndofukidzwa neupenyu hwake   
Ndozoziva upenyu hwese   
Upenyu hwangu hwechitema   
Hwafukwa nehwake huchena

Zvironda zvechitema zvadzama, Zvakatsvuka, Mweya unotya   
O kufukidzwa nemwi Jesu, Ndosunungurwa nemutemo

Ndoda kuziva rusununguro! Jesu ondipa nguwo chena   
Ndaigashira, yangu ndarasa, Ndinopfeka upenyu hwenyu

Ndadzorerwa nerufo rwangu, Ndaruramiswa nemwi Tenzi   
Ndaereswa neinzwi renyu, Ndozogashira mbiri yenyu

title: 295 Da’Dzira Hondo
markdown:
### 295 Da’Dzira Hondo

 Da’Dzira Hondo, mhandu yapetyo, Sim’dza mureza waTenzi   
Pfeka chishangu, Simbayi mese, Simbirayi painzwi rake

  **CHORUS:**      
Vakani simudzayi mureza   
Gadzirira, nyeweranayi   
Enda mberi, Daidza Hosana!   
Kristu m’tungamiri wehondo

Farayi mukumbane nemhandu, Idi rinokurirazve   
Chishangu nemureza zvipenye, Tichakurira, hatitadzi

O Mwari wevese chitinzwayi, Tibatsireyi netsitsi   
Hondo yazopera, takurira, Tingazopfekawo zviremba

title: 296 Nditungamire Muponesi
markdown:
### 296 Nditungamire Muponesi

 Tenzi nditungamire, Munzira yangu yose   
Ndachengetwa, ndinemwi, Ndichagara murudo

  **CHORUS:**      
Tenzi, kuti ndisarasike m’nzira   
Mukuchinja kwenguva, Nditungamire Tenzi

Muribako’ro rangu, Cham’pupuri chauya   
Handizotyi ndinemwi, Ndinosimbira imwi

Ndisvitse kumagumo, Cham’pupuri chapera   
Ndozosvika nyika’yo, Masodzi opukutwa

title: 297 Zvakaroverwa Pamuchinjiko
markdown:
### 297 Zvakaroverwa Pamuchinjiko

 Kwava noumwe wakafa panzwimbo yangu, Kuti mweya sowang’ upone   
Wabvuma kufamba m’nzira yemuchinjiko, Kuti asunungure ini

  **CHORUS:**      
Zvakaroverwa’po, Pam’chinjiko wake   
O zvizhinji sey’ atakura!, Nekurwadzwa kose;   
Jesu atakura, zvese zvitema zvangu

Anemutsa, rudo, nenyasha kuneni, Anochenesa mwoyo wangu   
Handichina kuraswa, ngasununguka, Zvaroverwa pam’chinjiko

Ndichabatirira kuna muponesi, Ndichafara ndiri murwendo   
Ndine rwiyo momwoyo nepamuromo, Zvitema zvangu zvazobviswa

title: 298 Handichina Nechangu, Zvese Ngezvenyu
markdown:
### 298 Handichina Nechangu, Zvese Ngezvenyu

 Inguva inorwadza, Zvakadini yeurombo   
Apo ndati kuna Jesu, Zvese zvese ndezvangu   
Hapana nechenyuba, Zvese zvese ndezvangu   
Apo ndati kuna Jesu, Hapana nechenyuba

Asi’ ye akandiwana, Ndakam’vona pamuti   
Nemwoyo wangu ukati, Zvino zvimwe ndezvangu   
Nezvimwevo ndezvako, Zvino zvimwe ndezvangu   
Nemwoyo wangu ukati, Nezvimwe ndezvako

Misi yose mutsa wake, Unondibatsira, wondipfavisa   
Ndichiti zvangu zvova zvishoma,  Zvako zvova zvizhinji   
Zvangu zvava zvishoma, Wondipfavisa ndichiti   
Zvako zvava zvizhinji

Rudo rwenyu rwakakwira, Nekudzama kupinda   
Nyanza nedenga zvino-ka, Handichina nechangu   
Zvese zvazova zvenyu, Handichina nechangu   
Zvese zvazova zvenyu, Tenzi rudo rwakurira

title: 299 Garai Makafara
markdown:
### 299 Garai Makafara

 Mwoyo yedu ngaifare, Tinogununguneyi   
Kana ivo Baba vedu, Vachingotichengeta?

  **CHORUS:**      
Ngatifare, ngatifare, Tinovona kupenya   
Nzira yebasa yakanakisa, Kana tichifara

Apo achitungamira, Kana izvo zvitema   
Zvinozotikurirazve, Jesu anotibatsira

Kana tichirega basa, Tino rwadziwa mwoyo   
Mumvuri unoswedera, Kuzodzinga rufaro

O! vatsvene vanogara, Vachifarisisazve   
Nzira yavo inopenya, Idayi zvakanaka

title: 300 Zororo Ravakaneta
markdown:
### 300 Zororo Ravakaneta

Kune musha wevatsvene, Vozorora munyika   
Uko muponesi wangu, Akandigadzirira

  **CHORUS:**      
Kune zororo ikoko, kunezororo ikoko   
Kune zororo ikoko, ravakaneta   
Pamhendero yeJordani, Nemumunda weEdeni   
Panomuti weupenyu kunezororo

Andigadzirira imba, Inogara narini   
Kwandichazogara hangu, Kunyika iyo itsva

Hakuzovi nekurwara, Hakunazve urombo   
Asi ndicha pfekedzwazve, Chiremba cheupenyu

Hakuzovi norufu zve, Rumborera ruchabva,   
Vaponeswa vachafara kuna Jesu ouya.

Imbayi vadyi venhaka, Farai muchienda   
Muchazozarurirwazve, Mazambara eZioni
